review_data.title: Way better than the university food I remember!
review_data.content: This is a very good place to eat! If I sound surprise, it's because I am. My memory of university food-1963-was generally awful in every way. This place offers a wide variety of meals at very, very reasonable prices. Something for everyone. It's clean, bright...More

review_data.title: Günstige und ausgewogene Menüs
review_data.content: Es gibt immer 4 verschiedene Menues die allesamt sehr ausgewogen und lecker sind. Zu Mittagszeiten leider sehr von den Studenten...More

review_data.title: Good food, student eats.
review_data.content: I remember eating in the student cafes on the University of Texas campus in Austin... this food is WAY better! And it is a student place... don't expect fine dining, but you will get quality food, nicely served at a very reasonable price. It's just...More

review_data.title: always here
review_data.content: 食堂便宜好吃！ 尤其是学期中亚洲餐厅不错...More

review_data.title: 外面廣場正門的景觀很棒
review_data.content: 大學正門口的廣場 地勢是算是比較高的所以...More

review_data.title: cheap
review_data.content: If I have to eat there, I just take the salad bar. It's cheaper than the ETHZ mensa. It would be nice if they bring back the salmon and hamburger sandwich, the new sandwiches are too strange for me.

review_data.title: Great selection; buzzy lunchtime
review_data.content: Only recently discovered this was open to non-students, you just simply pay a higher rate for the food. But a great buffet, with a rotating choice of dishes - and a sizeable salad bar. Good food, good value, and always a buzzy crowd.
